name: Hidili Industry International Development Limited
description: Hidili Industry International Development Limited is a leading coal mining and trading company based in China. Established in 2006, Hidili focuses primarily on coal production and distribution, specializing in the production of high-quality thermal and metallurgical coal. The company operates several coal mines in the Sichuan province, leveraging advanced mining technologies and practices to ensure efficient and sustainable operations. Hidili also engages in the import and export of coal products, serving a diverse range of clients both domestically and internationally. The company is committed to adhering to environmental regulations and implementing sustainable practices in its mining operations to minimize ecological impact. With a robust supply chain and strong market presence, Hidili aims to capitalize on the growing demand for coal in various industries, including energy production and steel manufacturing. The company continues to invest in enhancing its operational efficiency, exploring opportunities in renewable energy, and maintaining high standards of corporate governance. Hidili's mission is to be a responsible leader in the coal sector while contributing to the energy needs of its customers.
